name: Mafalda Hopkirk
personality:
Given the politeness of her warning notices, and that Hopkirk's Polyjuice Potion was described as having a "pleasant heliotrope colour", it is possible that she was kindly and good-natured.
However, she was assumed to be sent by Travers, a Death Eater with pro-pure-blood supremacy ideals, to keep record for the Muggle-Born Registration Commission. This implies she may have been a pure-blood supremacist who supported Lord Voldemort's takeover of the Ministry and the subsequent persecution of Muggle-borns.
